message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $950,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the pricing. While $900,000 is certainly a respectable offer, I believe the true value of this product is closer to my initial proposal.  To move us closer to a deal, I'm willing to come down slightly to $930,000.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit far from my target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm proposing $920,000. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the product's value and my budget.
